ISSUE.TITLE: Incorrect Command for Package Manager
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve documentation ## Link [Local Development & CLI](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/local-development?queryGroups=package-manager&package-manager=pnpm) ## Describe the problem The commands to be used with pnpm package manager is not correct. ## Describe the improvement The command for running the supabase init is not `pnpm supabase init` and instead it should either be `pnpx supabase init` or `pnpm dlx supabase init` ## Additional context Similar to the effect `npx` has for `npm`, `pnpm dlx`/`pnpx` has for `pnpm`. You can check it out here: [pnpm dlx](https://pnpm.io/cli/dlx)
